CustomField.description: Schedule Item Codes (aka "RFP Codes") are used by MSN/Watercare in subsequent systems (e.g.EAM) in diverse finance processes and are used e.g. to define allowed costs for certain activities on a contractor "Contract Schedule" agreed with Watercare.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores the "Schedule Item Code" (aka RFP Code) for the activity carried out by the field crew.
CustomField.label: Schedule Item Code
